titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of Mrs Mary Dawes at Great Bardfield in Essex, January 15. 1690. By Thomas Pritchard, M.A. and late rector of West-Tilbury in Essex. Imprimatur. C. Alston. Nov. 16. 1692.
titleStmt.author: Pritchard, Thomas, d. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Walter Kettilby, at the Bishops-Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bishops-Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard
